name: Soundquake
description:
Soundquake is a minimalistic arena game in which you will play with sounds.
Tune your voice/whistles/instruments to match the enemies tones and release your shot to wipe them off.

Made for the Global Game Jam 2017 at first, now the game is being polished to be more enjoyable.

Instructions:

  • WASD to move
  • Sing to charge the wave
  • Space to shoot
  • Don't die

Credits:

Coded by Stefano Tumminello and Guido Gerosa

Arts by Matteo Marzorati

Special thanks:

Joey Reda and Giacomo M. Greco for sounds and music contributions.
